data.message: Hi facebook what do we do if a bully troll uses facebook to bully us by reporting us non stop and have our account get disrupted almost daily.it started with the moderators and admins in a group now a lot of players are being victimized as well.once would be fine but the person is doing it to random people there non stop to the point of bullying and harrasing everyone.it's causing a lot of fear and anxiety to over 37194 facebook users in that group.our duties to our company is also disrupted by it as we cant perform when our facebook gets disrupted.

replies.message: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Melissa. Can you please report this issue in our Help Center? http://bit.ly/2e2ii4H. -Joe
Facebook its important i have problem how can i contact with you about payment method
